name: Beat Up Time
description:
Beat Up Time is indie car racing game with a 2D retro style interface for mobile devices with a top-down view. Uses accelerometer to control the car. It has:
  • several cars with different driving feel.
  • tracks with interesting routes.
  • possibility to play single and indirect competition with other players.
  • rankings of players and their times on particular tracks.
Try it it's nice fun
